author: LiBrainian Core Team
description: Agent patrol preset for self-dogfooding quality validation
agentDescription: Agent patrol preset for self-dogfooding quality validation. Use this when task intent aligns with tags: meta, quality, dogfood, e2e. Use this construction when an agent task matches patrol dogfood workflows and the team needs a repeatable, typed analysis contract. It cannot replace full runtime verification and does not guarantee correctness outside the provided input and capability constraints.

examples.title: Example 1
examples.description: Run patrol-dogfood for a relevant intent
